item.title: Rwanda severs ties with Belgium over 'neo-colonial delusions'
item.description: In a strongly worded statement, Rwanda accuses Belgium of "lies and manipulation".

item.title: What is the 1798 law that Trump used to deport migrants?
item.description: The wartime Alien Enemies Act has been controversially used to deport Venezuelans to a mega-jail in El Salvador.

item.title: Czechs appeal for EU help with Radio Free Europe after Trump cuts
item.description: The US president signed an executive order on Friday to stop funding the American global broadcaster, following criticism from Elon Musk.

item.title: Cannes award-winning actress Dequenne dies at 43
item.description: Ã‰milie Dequenne shot to fame when she won the best actress award at the film festival at the age of 18.

item.title: White House denies defying judge's order over deportations to El Salvador
item.description: An order to halt the removal of 261 people came too late and had "no legal basis" anyway, the White House says.
